description:
The course is designed to prepare students to understand how to read, interpret, and analyze financial statements. Throughout the course, the instructor will help you in mastering fundamental concept, valuation techniques & models, and computer analytical skills by analysis of several real financial statements. Specifically, students are able to:
1. Apply ratio analysis to understand and assess firm’s performance
2. Interpret numbers in the financial statements
3. Understand financial statement disclosures in an informed manner
4. Compare companies financially, understand cash flow, and grasp basic financial issues and risk analysis concepts
5. Develop a more efficient and effective approach to researching, interpreting, and analyzing financial statements.
